About the Lessons

I offer a selection of 12 week courses, designed to help propel your understanding of the English Language:

  • General English
  • IELTS
  • Conversation classes
  • English Courtesy
  • Intercultural Communication
  • Special interest groups

All courses are conducted via video call, at a time that suits you.
